message: If you're facing these symptoms, maybe you're facing with Narcolepsy. I've an Ayurvedic remedy for it.

Medication & Habits to follow to recover: Take Ashwagandha for better sleep quality.
Use Jatamansi to reduce sleepiness.
Consume Brahmi for cognitive function.

precautions: Establish a regular sleep schedule
Limit caffeine and alcohol intake
Consult a sleep specialist for diagnosis
